page.title: 13EASTBOURNE'S NEWSPAPERS
page.content: OUR LOCAL NEWSPAPER IS PRINTED TWICE A WEEK.THE GAZETTE IS PRINTED ON A WEDNESDAY AND THE HERALD ON SATURDAY. GENERALLY THE PAPERS ARE FULL OF LOCAL NEWS ITEMS AND COMMENT BUT THEY ALSO GIVE FULL INFORMATION ON LOCAL EVENTS. IF YOU WANT TO KNOW WHAT IS GOING ON IN EASTBOURNE THEN YOU MUST READ ONE OF THE PAPERS EACH WEEK.OF COURSE, THE NEWSPAPERS ALSO HAVE A LOT OF ADVERTS, ESPECIALLY FOR HOUSES.WE ALSO HAVE AT LEAST THREE OTHER PAPERS DELIVERED TO THE HOUSE FREE OF CHARGE.THESE HAVE FEWER PAGES OF REPORTS AND ARE FULL OF ADVERTS.ONE OTHER PAPER WHICH IS FREE CAN BE COLLECTED FROM MOST NEWSAGENTS IS DEVOTED ENTIRELY TO ADVERTS.THIS IS VERY POPULAR WITH PEOPLE WHO WANT TO BUY CARS OR SMALL THINGS OR WANT TO FIND A PART-TIME JOB.WITH SO MANY FREE PAPERS WHO NEEDS TO BUY ONE?
